statements: SELECT * FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking;
SELECT location_name, technology_type FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, usage_count FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, technology_type, usage_count FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY usage_count DESC, technology_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, technology_type FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_count) AS avg_usage_count, SUM(usage_count) AS total_usage_count FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking GROUP BY technology_type;
SELECT location_id, location_name, technology_type, availability_status, usage_count FROM telecommunication_healthcare_tracking WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability
SELECT location, availability_status FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability WHERE technology_name = 'Telemedicine'
SELECT * FROM TechnologyUsage WHERE usage_percentage > 80
SELECT id, location, last_updated FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT technology_name, location FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability WHERE availability_status = true
SELECT * FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability WHERE availability_status = true;
SELECT technology_name, location FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability WHERE location LIKE 'Rural%';
SELECT id, technology_name, location FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM TechnologyUsage WHERE usage_percentage > 80;
SELECT technology_name, last_updated FROM RuralHealthcareAvailability WHERE location = 'Remote Village';
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_availability;
SELECT technology_name, availability_status FROM rural_healthcare_availability WHERE availability_status = true;
SELECT location_name, region FROM rural_healthcare_location ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT SUM(usage_duration) AS total_usage FROM rural_healthcare_usage;
SELECT technology_name, availability_status FROM rural_healthcare_availability WHERE technology_name LIKE 'Tele%' ORDER BY technology_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_availability WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT technology_name, usage_duration FROM rural_healthcare_usage WHERE usage_duration > 100;
SELECT location_name, region FROM rural_healthcare_location WHERE region = 'South';
SELECT technology_name, availability_status FROM rural_healthcare_availability ORDER BY availability_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_usage WHERE usage_duration BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY usage_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_centers;
SELECT id, name, location FROM telecommunication_providers;
SELECT id, location, services_provided FROM telecommunication_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, technology_used FROM rural_healthcare_centers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.id, r.name, t.name AS provider_name FROM rural_healthcare_centers r JOIN telecommunication_providers t ON r.technology_used = t.services_provided;
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_centers;
SELECT name, location FROM rural_healthcare_centers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, services_provided FROM telecommunication_providers WHERE location = 'City';

SELECT r.name, t.name as provider_name, u.usage_status FROM rural_healthcare_centers r JOIN technology_usage u ON r.id = u.rural_healthcare_center_id JOIN telecommunication_providers t ON u.telecommunication_provider_id = t.id;

SELECT r.name, u.usage_status, a.availability_status FROM rural_healthcare_centers r JOIN technology_usage u ON r.id = u.rural_healthcare_center_id JOIN availability a ON u.id = a.technology_id WHERE u.usage_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM rural_healthcare_facilities WHERE technology_available = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM telecommunication_devices ORDER BY device_type ASC;
SELECT coverage_id, network_provider, coverage_area FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_area LIKE 'Ind%';
SELECT log_id, device_id, usage_date, usage_hours FROM usage_logs WHERE usage_hours > 10 ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM rural_healthcare_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, technology_available FROM rural_healthcare_facilities WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name, location FROM rural_healthcare_facilities ORDER BY facility_id DESC;

SELECT rhf.facility_name, td.device_name, nc.network_provider FROM rural_healthcare_facilities AS rhf JOIN telecommunication_devices AS td ON rhf.facility_id = td.facility_id JOIN network_coverage AS nc ON td.device_id = nc.device_id WHERE nc.coverage_area = 'Urban';

SELECT rhf.facility_name AS facility, MIN(ul.usage_hours) AS min_usage_hours, MAX(ul.usage_hours) AS max_usage_hours FROM rural_healthcare_facilities AS rhf JOIN telecommunication_devices AS td ON rhf.facility_id = td.facility_id JOIN usage_logs AS ul ON td.device_id = ul.device_id GROUP BY facility HAVING COUNT(ul.usage_date) > 10;
